definition: to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive

sentences.english: An antenna was not found inside, but a balloon with freon was there.
sentences.chinese: 但裏面並未找到天線，而是一個氣球以及氟利昂。

sentences.english: It's called freon. It's also used in air conditioners.
sentences.chinese: 這就是所謂的氟利昂，它也用於空調。

sentences.english: Yet the CFCs already in the air are still doing their dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 但是空氣中現有的氟利昂製冷劑還在繼續肆虐。

sentences.english: Ref. Freon piping to end up done air-tightness test and vacuum test.
sentences.chinese: 冷藏氟利昂管系密性測驗和真空測驗。

sentences.english: Accommodation air-condition freon piping to be done air-tightness test.
sentences.chinese: 房艙空調氟利昂管系密性試驗。

sentences.english: For ozone depletion, we don't use Freon -discharging products.
sentences.chinese: 對臭氧層破壞，我們不用要氟利昂的產品。

sentences.english: Ref. Freon piping to be done air - tightness test and vacuum test.
sentences.chinese: 冷藏氟利昂管系密性試驗和真空試驗。

sentences.english: Accommodine air-condition Freon piping to end up done air-tightness and vacuum test.
sentences.chinese: 房艙空調氟利昂管系密性測驗和真空測驗。

sentences.english: Freon will not be used as refrigerant in the future.
sentences.chinese: 未來的製冷劑將不會使用氟利昂。
